text: Howard William Meeker, C.M. (4 November 1923 â€“ 8 November 2020) was a Canadian right winger in the National Hockey League. He was also a television sports announcer as well as a Progressive Conservative Member of Parliament from 1951 to 1953. Meeker was the last surviving member of the Maple Leafs 1947 Stanley Cup team, the Maple Leafs 1949 Stanley Cup team, the Maple Leafs 1951 Stanley Cup team, and the inaugural NHL All-Star Game. Meeker died on November 8, 2020 in hospital in Nanaimo, British Columbia at the age of 97. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey right wingers Category:Canadian television presenters Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Kitchener, Ontario Category:Politicians from Ontario Category:Sports commentators Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players
title: Howie Meeker
